channel.title: Comments on: Predictive APIs: Bringing Machine Learning to the Masses

item.description: […] To help make Predictive APIs more mainstream and accessible, Louis Dorard is organizing the 1st International Conference on Predictive APIs and Apps (PAPIs) as general chair.  […]
